channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Camera Deputaților

item.title: Opinion Poll by INSCOP, 1–30 June 2023 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Partidul Național Liberal: 62–80 seats
  • Partidul Social Democrat: 102–123 seats
  • Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor: 70–89 seats
  • Alianța 2020 USR-PLUS: 42–58 seats
